one_reviews_text: You did a wonderful job! This game is amazing!
Reminds me those old school game when I was young, nice work!
We need a flamethrower, throw the fire and burn!
A fast-paced game with arcade style.
A must-play game for rigt player!
I like this game, quite fun and entertaining.
Love this game, you can just destroy everything you meet in the scene.
Please add more weapon and levels, for example, chainsaw!
Not fun at all, don't think it was worth my $5.  I gave up on the boring car level where you have to run over 20 cars.  After that I uninstalled.  There are much better games at that price imo.
I like this game's style, you can bomb out everything in the game!
We need multi-player mode, I can't wait to fight with my buddy.
Fun game, but you need to add more level.
It's hard to decide its a good or bad game, but it is definitely a characteristic one.
Shoot a jet down with a desert-eagle!
Not bad, but it requires some more polish.

review_title: It is a excellent surprise.Quality game.
one_reviews_text: I like games like gta 5 this is like matrix so more cool.I would like to encourage you all to accept Jesus as your Lord and Savior.Praise Jesus!

review_title: Campy, Over the top, So bad it's good
one_reviews_text: Chinese devs take on westernized action cop getting revenge movies mixed with mid 90's style graphics and 80's action synth music. What's not to love? Mind numbing fun just blowing s#^t up!
Draw out your RPG, and fire a rocket to an Apache!
It's an intense yet simple game, very suitable for those who didn't have much time.
A boom boom boom game in VR, simple yet fun.
Rush through the street, like a Hammer!
I love playing this game, the map is free for you to explore and you can boom everything you see.
The city is doomed to end, for he blocked our hero's way
Run and shoot, that's what I like!
I  prefer 1st-person view, but I understand their choice.
I think you can add more mode, like killing xxx bad guys in 30 minutes, likewise.
A arcade TPS game in oculus, wow!
Nothing can stop our hero, nothing!
I am curious of the hero's story, please release a prequel,thanks.
I really loved this game, it's no GTA 5 but for the first free roaming city shooter allot of fun was to be had.
Good game,btw,how can I ride the jet-plane.
How about add more weapon and levels, it will make the game much better.
Hold your Ak 47 and swipe out the street,
Love it so much, hope you can make a sequel soon.
Do you consider of adding multiplayer-mode, it will make the game much better.
Wow, its so cool when you swipe the street with machine gun in  bullet time while jumping.
Kind of GTA-like game, though there is lot of boom everywhere in the game, you will not feel sickness.
Better than my expectation, nice game!
The open-scene movie's voice is very cute!
Not a vr game you will meet everyday, this game is very unique.
Be care of your back, the enemy comes from everywhere.
What I like most is that I can blow out everything in this game.
Little tip, by the aid of car,you can jump to place where you normaly can't reach.
In a violent city , the most reliable friend is a machine gun.
Add more weapons, and I will give you 5 star.
You can add more boss in the game, it will make the game funnier.
